details:
adjective
- used of buildings
- showing lack of emotional involvement
= synonyms: degage, uninvolved
- no longer connected or joined
= example: no longer connected or joined
= synonyms: separated
- not fixed in position
= example: not fixed in position
= synonyms: free
- lacking affection or warm feeling
= synonyms: uncaring, unaffectionate
- being or feeling set or kept apart from others
= example: being or feeling set or kept apart from others
= synonyms: separated, isolated, set-apart
